    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030911</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">El sistema endocrino</string>
            <string language="en">The endocrine system</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Drüsensystem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le système endocrinien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O sistema de endocrine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il sistema endocrino</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ενδοκρινές σύστημα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Trata sobre la función que realiza el sistema endocrino como sistema de coordinación. Explica el concepto de retroalimentación negativa y el funcionamiento de los tipos de hormonas de invertebrados y vertebrados.</string>
            <string language="en">Topic dealing with the function of the endocrine system as a system of coordination. It explains the concept of negative feed-back and the functioning of the different types of hormones in invertebrates and vertebrates.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">sistema endocrino</string>
            <string language="en">endocrine system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Reino Animal</string>
            <string language="en">Animal kingdom</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Thema, das die Funktion des Drüsensystems als 
System der Korrdination beschäftigt. Sie erklärt das Konzept 
des negativen Feedbacks und das Arbeiten der unterschiedlichen Typen 
der Hormone in den wirbellosen Tieren und in den Wirbeltieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sujet traitant la fonction du système endocrinien comme 
système de la coordination. Elle explique le concept du 
feedback négatif et le fonctionnement des différents types 
d'hormones dans les invertébrés et les vertébrés.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tópico que trata da função do sistema de 
endocrine como um sistema da coordenação. Explica o conceito 
do feedback negativo e funcionar dos tipos diferentes de hormones nos 
invertebrados e nos vertebrados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Soggetto che si occupa della funzione del sistema 
endocrino come sistema di coordinazione. Spiega il concetto di 
risposte negative ed il funzionamento dei tipi differenti di ormoni in
invertebrati ed in vertebrati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θέμα που εξετάζει τη λειτουργία του ενδοκρινούς 
συστήματος ως σύστημα του συντονισμού. Εξηγεί την έννοια 
της αρνητικής ανατροφοδότησης και τη λειτουργία των διαφορετικών 
τύπων ορμονών στα ασπόνδυλα και τα σπονδυλωτά.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Drüsensystem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
